page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE by Lee
page.content: On Monday I get up at about 6.00. At about 7.15 I have my breakfast. I pack my bag and go to school. I play football until the bell goes, then we line up to go in. In the classroom we do drawings and then we go in for Assembly, and practice hymns. Then we go back to class for lessons. At breaktime I play football and after that it's more work like writing or maths. At 12.00 it's dinner time. I have a packed lunch but you can have a hot dinner. After a bit more playtime we have more work, perhaps painting or P.E. Then I go home and play on my bike.
